title: Decrement a Number with JavaScript
content: You can easily decrement or decrease a variable with the -- operator.
Note: The entire line becomes i--;, eliminating the need for the equal sign.

exercises.instruction: Change the code to use the -- operator on myVar.
placeholder: // Only change code below this line

hint: You should not use the assignment operator.
You should not assign myVar with 10.
You should not change code above the specified comment.
